on display.translation[0].definitions[0]: something that is on display is in a public place where people can look at it
Mapplethorpe’s photographs were first put on display in New York.
One of the world’s oldest cars has gone on display in Brighton today.
on display.translation[0].definitions[1]: if a quality, feeling, or skill is on display, it is very clear and easy to notice
The musical talent on display is extremely impressive.
